about_the_game:
Welcome to Rewrite - DYH

  • A game that changes every time you play!
  • Dialog options will change randomly as every option may lead you to a different ending

In this unusual Visual Novel you get to control the mysterious Andrian who has the power to grant 3 Wishes.
Your mission is to achieve happiness for Jeff - a person that lost it all.

Revealing different wishes and unlocking different clues will add you more options for more endings.

Will you be able to get a perfect ending? Or will you rather listen to...Never mind.

See you in our game!
Isabelle


Full Version: Includes: Many more game endings, The ability to grant wishes, A hidden path.
Demo - No Wishes Version: Doesn't have the option to grant wishes, no special features and a certain someone will not approach you...

name: Rewrite Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 276 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-based sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Graphics: DX11 based graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-based sound card

short_description: Rewrite - DYH - A game that changes every time you play!
